sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>

    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('i18nView.pdComCalcFormulaSelect')" @backTo="back"/>

    <el-form ref="paramsForm" :model="params" label-width="auto">
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('pdDiscountFormulaSelect.productDetailsType')">
            <cus-select v-model="params.eq_productDetailType" :codetype="'ProductCategory'"
                        @change="productDetailTypeChanged"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.appointedProduct')">
            <el-select v-model="params.eq_pdInfoId" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable>
              <el-option v-for="item in productOptionList" :key="item.key" :label="item.pdCode+':'+item.pdName"
                         :value="item.id">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdRuleDtCls')" prop="ruleType">
            <cus-select v-model="params.pdBussDetailType" codetype="ruleBusinessDetailClass" disabled></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.formulaCode')">
            <el-input v-model="params.like_pdCalcCode" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item style="text-align: right">
            <el-button dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-search" size="small" type="primary"
                       @click="$refs.page.reload()">
              {{ $t('table.search') }}
            </el-button>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('i18nView.comCalcFormula')"/>
    <el-table ref="ruleTable" :data="ruleTable" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit
              highlight-current-row max-height="250" size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button dialog-disable="disable" size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.CalcFormulaType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'compensationFormula:associate'" dialog-disable="disable" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="mini" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{ $t('form.select') }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="ruleTable" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5" :params="params"
                    url="/compensationFormula/base/findAllCompensationFormula"/>

    <!-- 公式查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="'1'" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>

import {associate} from "@/api/basicinfo/productCompensation"
import {findAllProductByDetailType} from "@/api/basicinfo/invAmountFormula"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'compensationFormulaSelect',
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('pdCalcBussType', code)
    },
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  props: {
    displayForm: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      productType: '',
      productDetailType: '',
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdStartDateRule: '',
        pdStartDateMode: '',
        pdStartPeriod: undefined,
        pdStartPeriodUnit: '',
        pdEndDateRule: '',
        pdEndDateMode: '',
        pdEndPeriod: undefined,
        pdEndPeriodUnit: '',
        pdGracePeriod: undefined,
        pdObservationDay: undefined,
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        pdStartDate: undefined,
        pdStopDate: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType,
        current_pdBussId: this.displayForm.pdtempClmCtrlLimId,
        eq_productDetailType: '',
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        like_pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      productOptionList: [],
      invOptions: [],
      ruleTable: [],
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      }
    }
  },
  created() {
    let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
    if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
      Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
      this.params.product = this.product
      this.params.eq_productDetailType = this.product.cType
      this.productDetailTypeChanged(this.product.cType)
    } else {
      this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
    }
  },
  methods: {
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    getCaption(obj, state) {
      const index = obj.lastIndexOf(":")
      if (state === 0) {
        return obj.substring(0, index)
      } else {
        return obj.substring(index + 1, obj.length)
      }
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_formulaSelect', false)
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let pdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.product.id,
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
        pdBussType: '',
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType,
        pdBussId: this.displayForm.pdtempClmCtrlLimId,
        pdBussCode: this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode,
        pdStructureType: '',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      switch (this.displayForm.calcDetailType) {
        case "54":
        case "55":
        case "56":
        case "57":
        case "58":
        case "59":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdBussType = '10'
          break
        case "22":
        case "23":
        case "24":
        case "25":
        case "26":
        case "50":
        case "51":
        case "52":
        case "53":
        case "63":
        case "64":
        case "65":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdBussType = '2'
          break
      }
      switch (this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlLimLevel) {
        case "1":
        case "2":
        case "12":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '15'
          break
        case "3":
        case "4":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '16'
          break
        case "5":
        case "6":
        case "11":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '18'
          break
        case "7":
        case "8":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '13'
          break
        case "9":
        case "10":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '14'
          break
        case "13":
        case "14":
          pdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '12'
          break
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: pdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: pdtempPdCalc.pdBussType,
        pdBussDetailType: this.displayForm.calcDetailType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let flag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (flag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.$refs.page.reload()
          this.$emit('bringCalcCode', this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.$refs.page.reload()
              this.$emit('bringCalcCode', this.displayForm.pdBnftCtrlCode, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    },
    productDetailTypeChanged(val) {
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = ''
      this.productOptionList = []
      findAllProductByDetailType(this.buildRequestData({productDetailType: val})).then(response => {
        this.productOptionList = response.data
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
